definitions.title: n. m.
definitions.body: midst (Eg. Aram. Nab. Palm. [[גו]]; Targum [[גׇּיו]]; esp. cstr. [[בְּגוֹ]], [[לְגוֹ]], [[מִגּוֹ]]; so Syr. gaw; cf. BH [[נֵּו]], p. 156);—cstr. [[גּוֹא]] (so Nab. Cooke:No. 94) Da 3:26 +, Da 7:15 edd., Gi [[גּוֹ]] (Baer [[גּוֹא]], v. on Da 3:6); sf. 3 ms. [[גַּוֵּהּ]] † Ezr 5:7, 3 fs. [[גַּוַּהּ]] † Ezr 4:15, Ezr 6:2;—midst, alw. c. preps.:
